sqlMap.select: select LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION_ID, CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID, NAME, NEWRELATION, MOBILEPHONE, HOW_LONG, DISCONTENTMENT, DISCONTENTMENT_DETAIL, GAMBLING, GAMBLING_DETAIL, REMARK,SEQ from RL_LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION where LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION_ID = #linkmanInvestigationId:DECIMAL# order by RL_LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION.seq ASC
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_BASIC_INFO.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into RL_LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION (LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION_ID, CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID, NAME, NEWRELATION, MOBILEPHONE, HOW_LONG, DISCONTENTMENT, DISCONTENTMENT_DETAIL, GAMBLING, GAMBLING_DETAIL, REMARK,SEQ) values (#linkmanInvestigationId:DECIMAL#, #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#, #name:VARCHAR#, #newrelation:VARCHAR#, #mobilephone:VARCHAR#, #howLong:CHAR#, #discontentment:CHAR#, #discontentmentDetail:VARCHAR#, #gambling:CHAR#, #gamblingDetail:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#,#seq:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION set CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID = #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#, NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, NEWRELATION = #newrelation:VARCHAR#, MOBILEPHONE = #mobilephone:VARCHAR#, HOW_LONG = #howLong:CHAR#, DISCONTENTMENT = #discontentment:CHAR#, DISCONTENTMENT_DETAIL = #discontentmentDetail:VARCHAR#, GAMBLING = #gambling:CHAR#, GAMBLING_DETAIL = #gamblingDetail:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, SEQ=#seq:DECIMAL# where LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION_ID = #linkmanInvestigationId:DECIMAL#

update RL_LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION
CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID = #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#
NAME = #name:VARCHAR#
NEWRELATION = #newrelation:VARCHAR#
MOBILEPHONE = #mobilephone:VARCHAR#
HOW_LONG = #howLong:CHAR#
DISCONTENTMENT = #discontentment:CHAR#
DISCONTENTMENT_DETAIL = #discontentmentDetail:VARCHAR#
GAMBLING = #gambling:CHAR#
GAMBLING_DETAIL = #gamblingDetail:VARCHAR#
REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#
SEQ = #seq:DECIMAL#
where LINKMAN_INVESTIGATION_ID = #linkmanInvestigationId:DECIMAL#
